pages.text: $(l)(Defensive)/$$(br)The raft spell $(l)summons a 1 HP $(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/deployables/crude_raft)Crude Raft/$$(l) on your board/$. As long as the raft is not destroyed, you will not lose the game. $(l)The raft will fail and sink 3 turns after being summoned/$.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Be clever with your raft placement. Stay clear of obvious locations, and try to avoid areas that the oponnent can easily clear with abilities they have left.$(li)Remember that the raft only lives for 3 turns. Don't use this spell if you can't beat the enemy within those turns!

$(li)The raft must be placed on an unknown tile, meaning that any tile that has already been damaged is not valid. $(l)If you ignore this and still try to place the raft on a known tile, then nothing happens and the spell is wasted./$$(li)Don't place the raft on occupied tiles, as the spell will be wasted.
